thread.title: Watch Rae Sremmurd Bring Drake Out In Amsterdam
thread.title_full: Watch Rae Sremmurd Bring Drake Out In Amsterdam

author: Trevor Smith
title: Watch Rae Sremmurd Bring Drake Out In Amsterdam
text:
Home > Music > Watch Rae Sremmurd Bring Drake Out In Amsterdam Watch Rae Sremmurd Bring Drake Out In Amsterdam 0 0 Posted by Trevor Smith  33pm "I heard there’s no party like a SremmLife party." 
Drake 's The Boy Meets World European tour will take off later this week, but Drizzy decided to make an early appearance in the UK gearing up for his shows, surprise-guesting at Rae Sremmurd's gig in Amsterdam today. "Can we bring a fucking homie out? A fucking legend?" Rae Sremmurd's Swae Lee enthusiastically asked the audience as the opening of "Fake Love" played behind him. Moments later, Drake entered and rocked the crowd, asking permission to do one more record before he left."I came here to join this Sremm party because e, so if it’s okay with you I’d like to do one more," he said, before launching into "Jumpman."Watch footage from Drake's appearance below, as well as a clip of Sremm doing "No Type" which the crowd was unsurprisingly psyched to hear. Rae Sremmurd brings Drake out in Amsterdam. #Jumpman pic.twitter.com/kL0LXVcjLx — Word On Road (@WordOnRd) January 22, 2017 Brought out Drake tonight in Amsterdam tonight pic.twitter.com/Z0YjX5wJzW 
According to Drake fan site Word On Road, the Toronto rapper also attended a Bar Mitzvah last night. Drake at a bar mitzvah in Amsterdam. pic.twitter.com/nue31px6fD — Word On Road (@WordOnRd) January 22, 2017 Drake at a bar mitzvah in Amsterdam. pic.twitter.com/Qr4xG4IaCw — Word On Road (@WordOnRd) January 22, 2017 Drake last night at a bar mitzvah in Amsterdam. pic.twitter.com/skrqCdcM55 — Word On Road (@WordOnRd) January 22, 2017 
Rae Sremmurd are currently on their own European tour. Last week, they stopped by a French television show to perform and report the weather .
